thread.section_title: CarRental8 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarRental8 | carrental8.com | 7 of 86
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
I made a reservation without making sure my Pick Up and Return times were correct (left to defaults on form during check out for times- 12:00 AM) and also realized the return date I input was wrong, so had to modify
my reservation. CarRental8 customer service understood the request, modified these details, and reconfirmed my new arrangements. They also followed up to make sure it was as I requested. I do read reviews and so far my personal experience is positive.
